name: Double Shot Temple
description:
Work with your divided half to get through a randomly generated temple.

Game made for United Game Jam 2020, our first game jam game!

1. The theme was 2, so we decided to make a rogue-like shooting game with 2 playable characters that work together to get through a temple, you need both!

2. Switch between 2 players to get to the bottom of the temple, change players with SHIFT and shoot with mouse click. Move with wasd of course :).

3. Made in collaboration with: https://aragon-diego.itch.io/ 
@Viut24 & @Slowking_0
Music by: Abstraction http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

The game was originally supposed to have more of a story, but time constraints prevented it.
